Package camzup.pfriendly

Class ImageEntity2

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Entity
camzup.core.Entity2
camzup.core.MeshEntity2
camzup.pfriendly.ImageEntity2
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntity, IOriented2, ISpatial2, ISvgWritable, IUtils, IVolume, IVolume2, java.lang.Iterable<Mesh2>
Direct Known Subclasses:
TextEntity2
public class ImageEntity2
extends MeshEntity2
A convenience to create image planes. Creates a mesh entity with a rectangular mesh scaled to the dimensions of an input image and a textured material.

Not intended for use with the AWT renderer.

    • ImageEntity2

      public ImageEntity2​(java.lang.String name, processing.core.PImage texture, Color tint, float scale, int alignHoriz, int alignVert)
      Creates a named image entity from a texture. The mesh's scale matches the aspect ratio; the entity's scale matches the image's longer edge.
      Parameters:
      name - the entity name
      texture - the image texture
      tint - the tint
      scale - the entity scale
      alignHoriz - the horizontal alignment
      alignVert - the vertical alignment
